      public Functions()

  • Method Details

    • updateArray

      public static String[] updateArray(String[] currentArray, String value)
      Adds a given item to the current array by assigning all the elements of the current array and the new value to a new array with a greater length than the current array and returns the new array.
      Parameters:
      currentArray - array that need to be updated.
      value - new value that need to be added to the given array.
      Returns:
      newly updated array.

    • removeFromArray

      public static String[] removeFromArray(String[] currentArray, String value)
      removes a given value from an existing array.
      Parameters:
      currentArray - The array that needs to change.
      value - The value that need to be removed from array.
      Returns:
      the new array without the given value.

    • checkArrayValues

      public static boolean checkArrayValues(String value, String[] array)
      Checks a given value against a given array and returns true if present and returns false if not found.
      Parameters:
      value - the value to be checked against the array.
      array - the array to be checked against the value.
      Returns:
      true or false depending on the availability of value.

    • getIndex

      public static int getIndex(String[] array, String value)
      Compare a given String value against a given String[] array and if found, returns the int index of the value in the array.
      Parameters:
      array - the given array of Strings.
      value - the string value that need to be checked.
      Returns:
      int index of the value.

    • assignAllSeats

      public static String[] assignAllSeats()
      returns string[] array of all the seats. from A1 to D14
      Returns:
      a string array of seat ids.

    • printSeatingPlan

      public static void printSeatingPlan(String[][] seatRecord)
      Depending on the seat record, print the seating plan categorized by availability (O or X).
      Parameters:
      seatRecord - String[][] class attribute seatRecord of the DataHandler class.

    • validateSeatInputs

      public static boolean validateSeatInputs(String row, String column)
      Returns a boolean value depending on the availability of given row and column in the class attributes(rows, columns)
      Parameters:
      row - row that need to be verified
      column - column that need to be verified
      Returns:
      boolean (true/false)

    • printArrays

      public static void printArrays(String[] array)
      Prints out any given string array
      (for debugging purposes)
      Parameters:
      array - The array that needs to be printed.

    • formatTicket

      public static String formatTicket(String[] ticketInfo)
      Once the array containing ticket information is given, formats the values in the said array in a presentable manner and returns the formatted string.
      Parameters:
      ticketInfo - An array of length(6) containing user's name, surname, validation, seat, price, and email.
      Returns:
      A formatted string representing a ticket.
